TopicTitle: Windows, RO - Any way to turn down/off/set pod vibration values

Articles.Content:
As it says... I'd like to turn down the wild screen jumping during launch phase (and other times), so I don't *get a headache* trying to read the numbers.

thanks for any help.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T16:53:56Z" title="06/19/2015 04:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**
There's a thing in the settings, something like "screen shake multiplier" or something. Try turning that down. Alternatively you can switch it off altogether.
